title: Britain’s Decision to Go With Huawei on 5G
itunes:title: Britain’s Decision to Go With Huawei on 5G
description:
Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Businessweek Feature Writer Ashlee Vance discuss a small-rocket maker running a different kind of space race. Andy Browne, Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director, talks about Britain’s decision to go with Huawei on 5G. And we Drive to the Close with Shawn Cruz, Manager of Trader Strategy at TD Ameritrade.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
